english.segment1: With you. I can go anywhere. I can do anything. Cause you are the song I bring. With you. I can go anywhere. I can do anything. Cause you are the song I bring. With you. You are the air I breathe. Cause you are my everything. And I am an offering
english.segment2: I may live and I may die. Either way you�re glorified. Bless the day I give my life away
english.segment3: So let my life light up like the city lights. And let it burn for you in the darkest night, Lord. And let my life light up like the city lights. And let it burn for you in the darkest night

english.segment6: So let my life light up like the city lights. And let it burn for you in the darkest night, Lord. And let my life light up like the city lights. And let it burn for you in the darkest night
